programme.title: 100 Women
programme.sub-title: Raid at the Brothel Next Door
programme.desc: It all starts with a friendly voice that offers vulnerable women an opportunity when they need it the most - until the pin drops, and they realise their lives will never be the same. In Spain, both a destination and a transit country for victims trafficked for sex into Europe mostly from Latin America and Africa, an elite group of women investigators are fighting international gangs to liberate women from the sinister trap they are caught in. BBC 100 Women followed them as they engage in round-the-clock surveillance operations and raids, with unprecedented access into the heart of a global crime that is often hidden just in the flat next door.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC.

programme.title: Outrageous Homes
programme.desc: Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen meets a couple whose home and attire is gothic vampire fantasy. From their black lace four-poster to their red-tiled, red-grout bathroom, everything is on-theme, and they have a walk-in wardrobe to die for. We also meet Claire at her teeny-tiny Welsh cottage with maximum impact, and Will and George who love to live like a rich 1980s woman in her 40s. Laurence also visits Mary Rose, a well-known potter whose home is bursting with every colour. In Nottingham, he jumps back in time to a 1900s house with its very own corner shop, and he heads to Scotland where one homeowner has gone to extraordinary lengths to decorate her ceiling

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay travels across the United States in search of restaurants in dire need of renovation - and after analysing their situation, he has just 24 hours to bring them back from the brink of disaster. In this opening edition, Gordon must revamp Lowery's Seafood in Tappahannock, Virginia, where his crew find two brothers - one the owner and the other the manager - at odds with each other

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Five strangers compete to host the best dinner party to win a ¬£1,000 cash prize. This time, the competition comes from in and around Liverpool, where the first host, 42-year-old construction director David, is hoping to wow his guests with an evening dedicated to his favourite kind of food - a Chinese takeaway. The guests he's gunning to impress are 42-year-old coffee shop assistant Lisa, 63-year-old carpet layer Chris, 40-year-old singer Steph and 32-year-old comedian Sarah

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Comedian Sarah is the second to host in and around Liverpool, where she opts for an evening of hearty soul food. At the table, guests are shocked to find out about the host's day job and even more shocked to hear how one diner's love of kebabs derailed a night of passion

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Singing hairdresser Steph hosts the third dinner party of the competition and attempts to win over her guests with some Spanish food.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The penultimate host in and around Liverpool is coffee shop worker Lisa, who intends to treat her guests to the exotic flavours of Mexico. Even though she's never been there, her theory is that everyone likes chilli con carne. Chris doesn't disappoint with his choice of outfit and rocks up dressed as Pablo Escobar, the Columbian gangster. David and Steph discover that Lisa has a 'ladyship' title, while Sarah is confused by the margarita cheesecake thinking it'll be based on the pizza. There's more embarrassment for Sarah when she tells the group she thought Chris was dressed as Steph the previous night

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Last to host in Liverpool is carpet and flooring specialist Chris, who hopes his music-inspired nosh will send him to the top of the leaderboard. The evening gets off to a slow start when the guests are subjected to a passionate lecture from their host on the joys of carpets and vinyl flooring. However, David is fired up and pitches a business plan to furnish budgie cages with carpet off cuts. This is immediately shut down by budgie owner Lisa who has serious health and safety concerns for her feathered friend. Later, the recipient of the ¬£1,000 prize is revealed

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles leaves nothing to chance as he plans the perfect evening to propose to Daphne, but his efforts to persuade Martin to get her meddling mother out of the way by taking her on an impromptu date lead to disaster. Comedy, guest starring Millicent Martin, with John Mahoney and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Lilith's supposedly disabled half-brother Blaine Sternin comes to town seeking forgiveness for past misdemeanours - but Frasier is suspicious of his motives. Comedy, guest starring Michael Keaton (Batman)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles and Martin take pity on Frasier and individually set him up on dates with three women who they believe will sweep him off his feet, but unfortunately things do not go to plan. Comedy, with Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game with Rory Bremner joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: Cheers
programme.sub-title: To All the Girls I've Loved Before Season 6, Episode 17
programme.desc: The gang throws Frasier and Lilith stag and hen parties, but after hearing grim stories about marriage, the groom begins to question his decision to walk down the aisle

programme.title: Cheers
programme.sub-title: Let Sleeping Drakes Lie Season 6, Episode 18
programme.desc: Norm repaints Evan Drake's house while he is away, and gives Rebecca the chance to come over and look at his bedroom, but things go awry when Drake returns home early

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Frasier helps Carla overcome her terror of flying, while Rebecca anxiously awaits a visit from a restaurant critic. Bar-room comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and Rhea Perlman

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.sub-title: Doug Less - Part One Season 6, Episode 1
programme.desc: Part one of two. Doug takes Carrie on a romantic weekend break, but she grows increasingly jealous when his new, slimmer physique draws admiring glances from passers-by. Meanwhile, Spence and Danny are left to look after Arthur and the house - but find themselves arguing over the tiniest problems

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.sub-title: Doug Less - Part Two Season 6, Episode 2
programme.desc: Part two of two. Doug and Carrie end up lost in remote woodlands, ruining their romantic weekend. Comedy, starring Kevin James

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug asks Arthur to coach him at table tennis in a bid to beat Carrie and boost his deflated ego, while Spence is put out to learn his girlfiend has been promoted to waitress at the bowling alley. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Leah Remini

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Feuding brothers Niles and Frasier decide to find out once and for all which of them has the higher IQ. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Seattle shrink takes a dislike to KACL's newest presenter, sharp-tongued radio psychiatrist Dr Nora. Award-winning episode of the comedy series, guest starring Christine Baranski and Piper Laurie

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: When a Man Loves Two Women Season 6, Episode 21
programme.desc: Cassandra Stone, the woman Frasier dated on Valentine's Day, agrees to go out with him again - but the appearance of his former girlfriend Faye, who has been out of the country for a while, complicates matters. Comedy, guest starring Virginia Madsen and Amy Brenneman

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to marry Donny, but has a vision that suggests he is wrong for her, and tempts fate by turning to Niles for advice on how to proceed

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay travels to Fremont, California, in an attempt to save a restaurant that is tearing the owners' marriage apart. Saki Kavouniaris took over Spin a Yarn in 1995 and began to turn it into a success, before marrying bartender Jennifer. When the business started to fail, the couple decided to splash out on refurbishments to recover their glory days, but their efforts have been futile and now their relationship is at stake

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Headline update

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Tony-winning Broadway star Idina Menzel goes undercover to meet unknown musical talents who aspire to make it to the big stage. Disguised as a receptionist from a small town who dreams of performing on stage in the future, Idina meets two brilliant young singers and one unique and inspiring performer. In the end, Idina reveals her true identity and helps to turn their dreams into reality

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Christmas
programme.desc: The first of two programmes in which Jamie Oliver shares his easiest recipes for the festive season, including crispy duck with noodles, vegetarian filo pie, short rib beef and a decadent dessert

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game with Rory Bremner joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Ben Hillman heads to Gran Canaria to help Tom from Scotland find the perfect holiday home. Also along to help Tom in his quest is his son Alan, who works with him in the building trade, and would love to visit for family holidays. Working within a budget of ¬£120,000, Ben lines up five options for the pair to consider

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Near Le Havre, Chris and Jolyon are as busy as two elves at Ch√¢teau Trois Cloches, trying to finish their hallway before their annual Christmas soir√©e with friends and family. Donna and Paul are going deep underground as they hold their Christmas get-together in the ch√¢teau caves. Over in Montmorillon, Belinda and Lee are spreading plenty of holiday cheer, as they serve up an incredible dinner to 60 guests and go chestnut hunting in search of the true taste and smell of Christmas

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.sub-title: Payment Day, Fri 13 Dec 2024 Season 2024, Episode 80
programme.desc: It's been a topsy-turvy week with some B&Bers delighted with their scores - and others not so much. After a little bit of a praise and a lot of moaning on payment day, it remains unclear as to who will emerge victorious

programme.title: Kirstie's Handmade Christmas
programme.desc: The grand final sees the winners from each heat challenged to create a showstopping Christmas table. Kirstie Allsopp presents, joined by guest judge Patrick Grant, who has the unenviable task of choosing the winner. Patrick also rolls up his handmade sleeves to fashion a stylish pinecone wreath

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family goes away to Marge's favourite childhood holiday destination, which has unfortunately changed since she was last there. Homer spurs the locals into sprucing the place up, but an exuberant firework display wrecks everything, forcing him to make amends by becoming a fisherman

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Unreported World
programme.desc: Almost 8,000 people are homeless in Vegas - a 56 per cent increase in three years. Jordan Jarret-Bryan investigates how the city is responding to this crisis as he visits a network of subterranean tunnels that have become a refuge. Jordan meets Echo Marie, who lives in a tunnel just four feet high. In a city that has made living on the street a crime, and having been moved by police from one neighbourhood to another, Echo says a tunnel is the safest place to live. However, life underground is still risky - some tunnels are drug ridden, while all those underground risk being washed away by the rain

programme.title: Junior Taskmaster
programme.sub-title: You Can't Milk a Pigeon Season 1, Episode 6
programme.desc: Contestants - all aged between nine and 11 - are on tenterhooks as they compete in the first semi-final. Junior Taskmaster Rose Matafeo scrutinises their every move and loyal assistant Mike Wozniak has even combed his moustache for the occasion. The hopefuls perform a poem about their favourite celebrity and recount some secrets to a milkman called Mark

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics appraise shows including You Bet!, Black Doves, Jamie Cooks Christmas, Wolf Hall: The Mirror and the Light, The 1% Club and A Nonsense Christmas with Sabrina Carpenter

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by guests Jameela Jamil, Fin Taylor and Richard Ayoade for a comic review of the significant moments of the past seven days. As usual, the hashtag #isitok paves the way for the gang to round up, examine and explain the leading and most entertaining news stories of the week

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts an edition packed with festive surprises. Countdown regulars Susie Dent and Rachel Riley are on hand to help maintain order as Jon Richardson and Sarah Millican take on Lee Mack and Jason Manford. They are joined by guests Nick Mohammed and Joe Wilkinson

programme.title: Jon Richardson: The Knitwit
programme.desc: A stage show, recorded at the Hackney Empire. With his trademark fastidious humour Jon asks all the important questions - will the recycling be put out on the right day, who is going to smooth over the top of the margarine and how many lights are on upstairs when everybody is downstairs?

programme.title: Action Point
programme.desc: DC is the owner of an amusement park where the rides are designed with minimum safety. He has to juggle the arrival of his estranged daughter, Boogie, with a major theme park opening nearby which threatens his business. Comedy based on a true story, starring Johnny Knoxville and Eleanor Worthington-Cox

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay travels across the United States in search of restaurants in dire need of renovation - and after analysing their situation, he has just 24 hours to bring them back from the brink of disaster. In the second episode, Gordon and his team arrive at Blend on Main in New Jersey, where they get to work renovating the once popular restaurant which has fallen into decline, leaving the owner and chef Lou Smith $500,000 in debt

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Doug Guller, the CEO and founder of Bikinis Sports Bar and Grill, a restaurant chain known for its scantily-clad waitresses, poses as a reality show contestant and works undercover alongside his staff. With big growth for the business on the horizon, he wants to make sure everything in the organisation is running smoothly

programme.title: Kirstie's House of Craft
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp takes on food-inspired crafts by creating vegetable-printed greeting cards and trinket dishes made from salt dough

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: War of the Words Season 9, Episode 18
programme.desc: Frederick wins a national spelling competition, but the other entrants' parents claim Frasier helped him by silently mouthing the letters of difficult words - a view shared by the judges. Comedy, guest starring Trevor Einhorn

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz struggles to tell Alice her hamster is dead, while Niles and Frasier return to their childhood home and discover what they believe to be evidence of a murder

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Love You Fake Season 9, Episode 20

programme.desc: The presenter visits the Firth of Clyde, in Irvine, a harbour town steeped in shipping history - a fitting home for the Scottish Maritime Museum. She hears the history of this glass-roofed Victorian Linthouse which once stood in a shipyard on the Clyde, was salvaged and moved 30 miles to its current location. programme.title: Freddie Mercury's Christmas Story
programme.desc: Aside from being the only act in musical history to land the same UK Christmas number one twice, Queen's affinity with the yuletide season ran deeper than just commercial success. With Bohemian Rhapsody halfway through its nine-week run atop the charts in December 1975, Queen chose Christmas Eve to play a televised tour de force from London's Hammersmith Odeon. Freddie Mercury had a deep-rooted love for everything Christmas, with a lifelong generosity of spirit. In this documentary, friends and loved ones reflect on the band, alongside many of Queen's best-loved hits and rare footage of Mercury with some of his closest confidantes

programme.title: Queen: Rock the World
programme.desc: Documentary following the band as they recorded their sixth album, News of the World, and made plans for a tour of the US. Back in 1977, broadcaster Bob Harris was granted exclusive access, conducting interviews with all four members, as well as filming them at work in the studio, rehearsing their North American Tour. Until recently, the documentary was never completed and the footage lay unused in the archive. The film is supplemented by footage shot in the summer of 2017 as Brian May and Roger Taylor took Queen back to the US with Adam Lambert as lead singer

programme.title: Cruising with Jane McDonald
programme.desc: The singer heads to Alaska, America's largest state and home to some of the most breathtaking scenery on the planet. She takes a helicopter trip up to an ice field for a dog-sledding adventure, and later witnesses the majesty of the Margery glacier, a 21-mile stretch of ice in the Glacier Bay National Park. On board Holland America's ship Nieuw Amsterdam, Jane goes backstage to meet the cast of the nightly musicals, has a cooking lesson from the executive chef and reveals how to make the most of a lazy day in port

programme.title: Cruising with Jane McDonald
programme.desc: The singer heads off to uncover the mysteries of the Mediterranean on an island-hopping tour of Greece. She begins by riding a Segway - a personal transportation vehicle - through the ancient streets of the capital Athens, before boarding her ship to start her aquatic adventure on the Mediterranean. With champagne-popping nights out in party capital Mykonos, and the stunning sunsets on the island of Santorini, this cruise offers the perfect combination of ancient Greek history and exciting modern landscapes

programme.title: Cruising with Jane McDonald
programme.desc: The singer begins her Portuguese adventure in Porto, where she discovers the roots of a similarly named fortified wine. She then boards the impressive vessel that will take her down the River Douro. The cruise delivers her to the architectural wonder of Lamego, Vila Real and the home of Mateus Rose. She even manages to hop over the border to Spain to visit the city of Salamanca. There is plenty of food, drink and local culture on offer on Jane's luxurious cruise, which ends its journey in the capital city of Lisbon

programme.title: Aldi vs M&S: Who Does Christmas Better?
programme.desc: With competition among supermarkets more intense than ever, food experts compare a number of key products from premium brand Marks & Spencer and discount store Aldi to see which one does Christmas best. The programme also looks at their Christmas ad campaigns and dives into the history of both stores, focusing on how they way they sell Christmas has evolved over the decades

programme.title: The 1970s: Those Were the Days
programme.sub-title: A '70s Christmas: Those Were the Days Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: A trip down memory lane revealing what Christmas was like in the 1970s, with contributions from broadcaster Angela Rippon and Slade guitarist Dave Hill and a host of experts and historians. The programme reveals what was served up for dinner, what was on TV, the most popular presents found under the tree and the tunes that topped the charts. Plus, the Hastings from Surrey are challenged to put away their smartphones and immerse themselves in a Christmas of the 1970s, making Christmas decorations inspired by Blue Peter, trying the hit boardgame Mastermind, tackling a frozen turkey, tucking into Tunis cake and finding out how easy it really is to bounce on a space hopper

programme.title: Michael McIntyre: Funny Man
programme.desc: An affectionate look back at the comedian's life and career in a documentary charting his early struggles to launch his showbusiness career through to hosting the Royal Variety Performance and his arena-filling tours. programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack

programme.title: Arizona Raiders
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the American Civil War, two Confederate soldiers are offered a way out of jail. Their former comrades-in-arms are now a gang of bandits terrorising Arizona, and the two prisoners are sent to infiltrate the group and bring them to justice. Western, starring Audie Murphy, Buster Crabbe, Ben Cooper and Gloria Talbott

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: The leaders of the tiny European duchy of Grand Fenwick decide to solve their bankruptcy problem by declaring war on the USA. They confidently expect to lose and thereby qualify for economic aid - but the plan takes an unexpected turn for the worse when the Americans surrender. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers in three roles, with Jean Seberg, William Hartnell, David Kossoff and Leo McKern

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: A workaholic father tries to make up for his perpetual absence from home by promising to buy his son a hugely popular action figure for Christmas - little realising every other father in town has the same idea. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Jake Lloyd, Rita Wilson, Robert Conrad and Phil Hartman

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: A tough detective is forced to pose as a preschool teacher in a bid to capture a drug dealer whose son is one of the pupils. However, his biggest challenge turns out to be controlling a class full of five-year-olds. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Penelope Ann Miller, Linda Hunt, Pamela Reed and Richard Tyson

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong

programme.title: The Running Man
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot is framed for the murder of starving civilians - and ends up being forced to take part in a brutal TV game show in which a succession of gadget-wielding killers hunt him on the streets of Los Angeles. Sci-fi action adventure inspired by a Stephen King story, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Yaphet Kotto, Maria Conchita Alonso and Richard Dawson

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two mismatched undercover cops set out to halt an underground gang war and bring down a drug lord attempting to flood the market with a deadly form of Ecstasy. However, a romantic interlude threatens to drive the investigation off course. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Molla and Peter Stormare

programme.title: Ice Cold in Alex
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of an ambulance become stranded in the Libyan desert and face a perilous journey back to civilisation. Leading the trek is an alcoholic army captain, who vows to remain sober until he has completed the task - but his resolve is threatened by a stranger they rescue who is secretly an enemy spy. Second World War drama, with John Mills, Sylvia Syms, Anthony Quayle and Harry Andrews

programme.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
programme.desc: A determined salesman takes custody of his five-year-old son when his wife leaves him, and secures an unpaid internship with a renowned stockbroking firm. However, the lack of a steady income begins to take its toll on the pair, leading to eviction from their home and a daily struggle to support themselves. Gabriele Muccino's fact-based drama, starring Will Smith alongside his son Jaden. With Thandiwe Newton, Brian Howe, James Karen, Dan Castellaneta and Kurt Fuller

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: A fleet of huge flying saucers launches a devastating and unprovoked attack on Earth. As survivors try to flee the seemingly unstoppable alien invaders, the courageous US president, an ace pilot and a computer genius come up with a plan to take the fight to the enemy and save the human race. Roland Emmerich's sci-fi adventure, starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum, Mary McDonnell, Randy Quaid, Robert Loggia and Harry Connick Jr

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: Falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, Judah Ben-Hur, a Jewish nobleman and officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge. However, he instead finds redemption. Director Timur Bekmambetov's adaptation of Lew Wallace's 1880 novel Ben-Hur: A Tale of the Christ, starring Jack Huston, Toby Kebbell and Rodrigo Santoro

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: A former soldier injured in the line of duty takes up a new career as a financial analyst for the CIA. However, his deskbound position changes to a dangerous undercover assignment when he discovers a plot to destroy the US economy. Spy thriller inspired by Tom Clancy's novels, starring Chris Pine, Keira Knightley, Kevin Costner and Kenneth Branagh, who also directed

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: A former US government operative battling with an addiction to alcohol is hired as a bodyguard to the nine-year-old daughter of a wealthy businessman in Mexico City. When the girl is abducted, he swears vengeance on those responsible while setting out on a dangerous, revenge-fuelled rescue mission. Action thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Christopher Walken, Radha Mitchell and Dakota Fanning

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: World leaders gather in London for the funeral of the British Prime Minister, unaware they have been led into a trap. A terrorist plans to kill them all, and devastate the city, and the only people in a position to stop him are the President of the United States and the indomitable head of his secret service. Action thriller sequel to Olympus Has Fallen, starring Gerard Butler, Aaron Eckhart and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent a precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: A reporter's purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirate's lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielberg's animated adventure based on Herge's comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: The Northman Interview Special
programme.desc: Alexander Skarsgard, Anya Taylor-Joy and director Robert Eggers talk about making their Viking adventure

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: The Northman Interview Special
programme.desc: Alexander Skarsgard, Anya Taylor-Joy and director Robert Eggers talk about making their Viking adventure

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends
programme.desc: A music executive heads out to a Cornish fishing village on a mission to recruit a group of 10 local fishermen into recording an album of sea shanties. He struggles to win over the unlikely boy band and their families, but begins to gain a new appreciation for their traditional values. Comedy, starring James Purefoy, Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: A rookie cop finds herself targeted by corrupt police and gangsters when she witnesses a drug dealer's murder. She teams up with the one person from her community who is willing to help her, as she tries to escape both the criminals out for revenge and the police who are desperate to destroy the incriminating evidence. Crime drama, starring Naomie Harris, Tyrese Gibson and Frank Grillo

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.sub-title: The Last Ride of the Dodge City Rambler Season 15, Episode 22
programme.desc: The Smiths take a trip on an old steam locomotive to visit Francine's aunt, but the train ends up being hijacked

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: Routines by some of the nation's best-loved comedians, including Jack Skipper, Desiree Burch, Nabil Abdulrashid, Sam Williams, Esther Manito, Jamie D'Souza and Dee Allum.

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmondson narrates a selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts, featuring the longest motorcycle jump, the loudest burp and the tightest parallel parking. He also reveals the oddest record in the book

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmondson narrates attempts to make records for opening bottles using teeth, restraining motorcycles and catching arrows with bare hands

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.sub-title: A Pane to Wash/Telephone Pole Gags 2: High Wire/Saddle Sore Season 1, Episode 31
programme.desc: Animated series inspired by the classic Looney Tunes shorts. Porky Pig and Daffy Duck wash the windows of a high-rise building, and Yosemite Sam is tamed.

programme.sub-title: Trans Oceanic Magical Cruise Season 7, Episode 16
programme.desc: It's fun on the high seas, as the Teen Titans enjoy a cruise filled with dangerous missions, fast cars and alien attacks

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.sub-title: Where Exactly on the Globe Is Carl Sanpedro - Part 2 Season 6, Episode 26
programme.desc: Animated series based on the DC Comics fictional superhero team the Teen Titans. When Carl Sanpedro strikes in Jamaica, the Titans take off for the Caribbean

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.sub-title: Keep Calm and Roll On Season 1, Episode 7
programme.desc: Animated series. After Jestah's insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries not to let the big-wheeled bully's words get to her.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to get a bride to church on time and in any way he can

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants a smartphone but finds that they are too expensive, especially when you can build your own...

programme.sub-title: Attack of the Headless Horror Season 1, Episode 22
programme.desc: Fred's favourite adventurer Rick Spartan comes to take over the school's biology class, but he is being haunted by the Headless Creature

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang get caught up in international espionage and intrigue when they cross paths with a British secret agent on a mission

programme.title: What's New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: Fright House of a Lighthouse Season 3, Episode 1
programme.desc: The residents of a small town are frightened when their lighthouse appears to be haunted

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: Alex Trebek hosts an episode of the quiz show Jeopardy! featuring Velma, Shaggy, and a robot who is a sore loser

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmonds narrates another selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar records, including the most people in a Mini, the fastest time to smash a piano and the man who can put the most scorpions in his mouth

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmonds narrates another selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar records, including the tightest parallel parking in the world, the fastest sheep-shearer and a man whose eyes pop out of their sockets

programme.title: Secret Crush
programme.desc: The lovelorn singletons revealing all include Danielle, who is hoping to prove she is more than just a side-dish to ladies-man Alexi, while wannabe WAG Brooke hopes sparks will fly with Shaun. Verona Rose presents

programme.title: Secret Crush
programme.desc: DJ Noah hopes music is the food of love for Meryn, while bar manager Antonio looks to woo single mum Lara. Comedian Verona Rose hosts

programme.title: Dress to Impress
programme.desc: Opera singer and model Paige from Hertfordshire returns to the show to be dressed by three male suitors. Whose outfit will she choose to wear on the date?

programme.title: Supermarket Sweep
programme.desc: Rylan Clark hosts a revival of the supermarket-based game show in which three pairs of shoppers go wild in the aisles to win a ¬£3,000 prize

programme.title: Family Fortunes
programme.desc: Gino D'Acampo hosts this revamped version of the game show in which the Wilson family from Worcester take on the Popat family from Harrow. The family who score the most points go through to Big Money, which sees two of them answering just five questions for the ¬£30,000 jackpot

programme.title: Charmed
programme.sub-title: Sword and the City Season 6, Episode 8
programme.desc: The Lady of the Lake needs the sisters' help to protect Excalibur, the legendary sword in the stone. Before long, a host of magical beings arrive at the manor and attempt to pull the sword out, but it is Piper who finally succeeds. Starring Holly Marie Combs, Alyssa Milano and Rose McGowan

programme.desc: Lorelai finds herself reluctantly agreeing to attend Sherry's baby shower after giving Rory a lift. Miss Patty attracts a new admirer, and Luke is puzzled when Jess comes home with a new car. Lauren Graham and Alexis Bledel star

programme.title: Gordon, Gino and Fred's Road Trip
programme.sub-title: Gordon, Gino & Fred: Desperately Seeking Santa Season 1, Episode 1

But along the way, they face plenty of distractions, including ice swimming, saunas, snowmobiles and snowballing

While Barnaby and Jones begin their investigations, tempers flare in the local community between Ernest, a firm believer in a mystical cult, and his former friend Aloysius - whose background in the jungles of South America makes him the prime suspect for the murder. Starring John Nettles, Ronald Pickup and Stuart Wilson

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.sub-title: Talking to the Dead Season 11, Episode 7
programme.desc: Two couples disappear in the tiny village of Monks Barton amid rumours of witchcraft and haunted woods. As Barnaby and Jones investigate, psychic Cyrus LeVanu clashes with cleric Wallace Stone over their different methods of 'healing' the woods, while other locals seem to be caught up in a stolen antiques racket. When a body is unearthed and the death toll rises, the detectives race to catch the killer by finding a connection between the missing couples and the thefts. Anton Lesser guest stars, with John Nettles and Jason Hughes

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.sub-title: A Tale of Two Hamlets Season 6, Episode 4
programme.desc: A stately home is turned into a theme park celebrating the work of local horror writer Ellis Bell, but the opening ceremony is marred by the death of a film star. Barnaby and Troy's investigation uncovers the secrets within an eccentric family, and a centuries-old village feud comes under the spotlight. Murder mystery, written by Alan Plater and guest starring Beth Goddard

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A book dealer is found drowned, having seemingly committed suicide in despair at having sunk all his cash in a local inventor's revolutionary new transport system - but the discovery of a second body makes it clear that there is a murderer at large. Detective drama, starring John Nettles, Daniel Casey, Kate Buffery and Richard Todd

programme.title: Wycliffe
programme.desc: A schoolgirl is found dead after a disco, and Cornish copper Charles Wycliffe applies himself to the task of discovering whether she was murdered or committed suicide. Jack Shepherd and Helen Masters star

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: The murder of a babysitter throws up a number of questions for Lewis and Hathaway - was she the intended victim or was the killer targeting her employers? Was the crime calculated or opportunistic? And why was she elaborately tied up after being murdered? As the detectives dig for clues, they are led into a world of suburban swinging and fetish photography, far removed from the Oxford they know. Gary Kemp (The Krays), Lucy Cohu (The Awakening), Ciaran McMenamin (Primeval) and Georgia Taylor (Casualty) guest star

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: A confrontation between hunt stewards and saboteurs leads to the suspicious death of a protester - and makes Jack wonder whether the thrill of the chase has given the horsey set a taste for human blood. Whodunit, starring David Jason as DI Frost, with Bruce Alexander, Sean Pertwee, Del Henney and Tat Whalley

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Plans for Robert's birthday party are under way, but Rose's surprise contribution to the event ruffles feathers above and below stairs. Mary faces dramatic repercussions when a new farming venture is launched on the Downton estate, while Edith receives more unwelcome news. Hugh Bonneville, Lily James, Michelle Dockery and Laura Carmichael star in the costume drama

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Cora's playboy brother Harold has got himself into a spot of bother and Robert has to make a trip to America to bail him out. Blake and Mary are forced to put aside their differences to deal with the new farming venture on the estate, and help comes from an unlikely quarter when Violet is taken ill. Meanwhile, Mrs Hughes, Mrs Patmore and Carson try to keep the peace when romantic tensions cause disagreements downstairs. Hugh Bonneville, Julian Ovenden, Michelle Dockery and Maggie Smith star in the costume drama

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Rosamund comes up with a plan to help Edith out of her predicament, but will Violet see straight through it? Rose is frustrated when things don't go her way and Alfred realises too late he may have made a mistake. Anna is concerned by unexpected news just as she and Bates seem to be getting over the worst, Isobel finds herself the object of someone's attention and Mary asks Gillingham for a favour

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: It's summer and as part of Rose's debutante 'coming out' she is to be presented at Buckingham Palace. The family is in London, preparing Grantham House for the busy social programme, and Martha Levinson, not one to miss such a grand occasion, arrives from New York with Cora's recently disgraced brother Harold (Sideways star Paul Giamatti). Both outspoken and larger than life, they make quite an impression on certain members of high society. Meanwhile, when the Crawleys are implicated in a scandal that threatens to engulf the monarchy, Robert goes to great lengths to protect the royal family - and his own. Costume drama, starring Lily James, Shirley MacLaine, Hugh Bonneville, Maggie Smith, Laura Carmichael and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: While Britain feels the winds of change swept in by a new Labour government in 1924, Downton's residents - both above and below stairs - are undergoing alterations too. After mourning the death of his beloved wife Lady Sybil for four years, Branson decides it's time he got on with his life, although Robert isn't comfortable about the ex-chauffeur's relationship with local teacher Sarah Bunting. Mary is also ready for love again - but which of her beaus is her Mr Right? Meanwhile, Edith struggles to cope with being parted from her baby, Jimmy receives unwanted female attention and plans for a war memorial cause tension

programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.sub-title: A Breath of French Air - Part One Season 1, Episode 5
programme.desc: Part one of two. Dispirited by a wet English summer, the Larkins cross the Channel in the hope that the French way of life will have a beneficial effect on the family. David Jason, Pam Ferris and Catherine Zeta-Jones star

programme.title: The Darling Buds of May
programme.sub-title: A Breath of French Air - Part Two Season 1, Episode 6
programme.desc: Part two of two. The family warms to the French way of life, but Charley is unhappy with Mariette's flirting - and after a little Dutch courage, decides to take matters into his own hands. Drama, starring Philip Franks and Catherine Zeta-Jones

programme.title: Vera

Crime drama, starring John Simm

programme.title: Car S.O.S.

programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer revisit successful buyers from seasons past. programme.desc: Documentary following the work of the British Army soldiers who defuse bombs in the UK, providing an insight into the training they receive at 'Bomb School' in Bicester. Sergeant Alex 'Swansea' Hughes is called out at night to a woodland near Clitheroe, where a dog walker has found an explosive dating back to the Second World War. Swansea must make it safe by taking it to a large open field and blowing it up. Sergeant Sam Jones - a veteran of Afghanistan - has seen a spike in the number of calls the bomb squad receive in the UK due to the craze of magnet fishing. Treasure hunters hurl large industrial weights into lakes and canals but often get more than they bargained for, pulling out all manner of potentially deadly explosives including mortar bombs and hand grenades, with one man causing a major incident by disposing of a grenade in a dustbin on the industrial estate where he works

programme.title: Inside the Bomb Squad

programme.title: The Princess Bride
programme.desc: A storybook stableboy turns pirate (Cary Elwes) and rescues his beloved (Robin Wright), who is about to marry a dreadful prince.

programme.title: Broadcasting Christmas
programme.desc: When two exes compete for the same co-host position at the nation's favorite morning show in Manhattan, they discover that the fire that burned between them is still alive.

programme.title: A Wedding for Christmas
programme.desc: Haley escapes her small-town and builds a life in Los Angeles as a wedding planner. When her sister asks her to plan her wedding, Haley returns to her childhood town and reunites with a childhood flame.

programme.title: 24 Hours to Live
programme.desc: After a mercenary dies in a brutal firefight, a new regenerative surgery gives him a second chance at life and another shot at redemption.

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic ice age forces humanity's last survivors aboard a globe-spanning supertrain. One man (Chris Evans) will risk everything to lead a revolt for control of the engine and the future of the world.

programme.title: Kick-Ass
programme.desc: Despite a complete lack of extraordinary powers, a teenager (Aaron Johnson) reinvents himself as a superhero and, together with a father/daughter team of vigilantes, takes on a mob boss.

programme.title: Guns Akimbo
programme.desc: Miles is a video game developer who inadvertently becomes the next participant in a real-life death match that streams online. While Miles soon excels at running away from everything, that won't help him outlast Nix, a killer at the top of her game.

programme.title: 24 Hours to Live
programme.desc: After a mercenary dies in a brutal firefight, a new regenerative surgery gives him a second chance at life and another shot at redemption.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Following a double corneal transplant, a concert violinist (Jessica Alba) perceives frightening images of a world that only she can see.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: An American exchange student (Sarah Michelle Gellar) and her boyfriend (Jason Behr) encounter vengeful spirits that haunt a house in Tokyo.

programme.title: Winchester
programme.desc: To an outsider, Sarah Winchester's 7-story home looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah's actually building a prison -- an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts that have a score to settle with her family.
